resources.name: Criar Usuario
resources.description:
### This is for create one user for app ✅
#### Success ✅

when user not exists

return success is : **STATUS 201**

	{
		"situation": true,
		"msg": "User inserted with success"
	}


#### Erros ⛔

when user not exists

return not success is : **STATUS 400**

	{
		"situation": false,
		"msg": "User not exists for he to be inserted"
	}

### This is for create one user for app ✅
#### Success ✅

when user not exists

return success is : **STATUS 201**

	{
		"situation": true,
		"msg": "User inserted with success"
	}


#### Erros ⛔

when user not exists

return not success is : **STATUS 400**

	{
		"situation": false,
		"msg": "User not exists for he to be inserted"
	}

body.text:
{
  "nome_funcionario": "Funcionario Junior",
  "telefone": "(31)9999-9999",
  "endereco": "Rua Bento Ribeiro, Bota Fogo, Ribeirão da Neves MG",
  "id_ocupacao": 1,
  "id_usuario": 8
}
